title: Fonseka’s Parliamentary privileges: Call for explanation from Army Commander, UNP urges Speaker
content: News Courtesy: Ada Derana The issue of the breach of Parliamentary privilege of Democratic National Alliance (DNA) leader Sarath Fonseka came up in Parliament today as well. Opposition Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe has urged Speaker Chamal Rajapaksa to call for an explanation from the Army Commander regarding the matter. United National Party (UNP) leader Ranil Wickremesinghe…
